body:
Veeam Software is the leader in software solutions for VMware virtualization systems management. Veeam is an international company with global headquarters in Baar, Switzerland, regional headquarters for EMEA in Paris, for the Americas in Columbus, Ohio and for Asia Pacific in Sydney.

Now we are looking for an energetic person who will join our team as EMEA Alliance Marketing Specialist.

Responsibilities

Co-marketing  with Veeam  alliance partners: NetApp, VMware, EMEA system integrators
Annual, quarterly research and planning
Provide marketing support for Veeam Alliance team members and EMEA field marketing
Tracking of alliance marketing activities on Salesforce, reports for promo programs
EMEA internal marketing space monthly update
Coordinate the hands-on day-to-day execution of marketing plans and action items
Internal education: leveraging of alliance marketing best practices for field marketing, channel, sales teams
Liaison with corporate alliance team: best practices collection and leverage across EMEA territories

Qualifications

Higher Education
Fluent English 
Experience of work in marketing and/or IT more than 3 years
Understanding of the roles played by alliance partners, distributors, system integrators and vendors in the channel
Negotiation skills
Advanced user of MSFT Power Point, Excel
Knowledge of Salesforce analytics as a plus
Active and reliable, self-starter
Team player, diplomatic

We offer

Work in a stable, dynamic company
Modern energetic multinational working environment
Competitive salary, depending on skills and experience
Extensive opportunities for professional growth
Flexible work schedule
An extended medical insurance policy
A partial compensation of costs on fitness
title: EMEA Alliance Marketing Specialist
locations: Afi park 1, București, Municipiul București, România
